author: jeremias
msg: Use sRGB fallback if an unknown color function is encountered.

author: reto
msg: CLEREZZA-271: keeping sharedRenderingValues across the ssp of a rendering process

author: lhazlewood
msg: SHIRO-189: Added OSGi manifest data via the maven-bundle-plugin for all distributable jars except for the 'all' .jar.  Will discuss this last one on the dev list.

author: jacopoc
msg: * "Fix for a rather important functional bug: dependent production runs were always created when a production run is created manually (and not from requirements etc.); in my opinion this should never happen, but I understand that it can be useful in some rare occasions, so I have added the option to select if mandatory production runs have to be created or not."

* "Refactored and improved the way the information about inventory items created by a production run is retrieved in the form; also added the status of the inventory: this fixes a functional bug where defective inventory items were shown together with valid ones and it was not possible for the user to figure out if the planned quantity for the production run was fulfilled or not."

author: sdeboy
msg: More minor changes to receiver config panel layout
